article_title: Clouds Darken for America’s Blue-Chip Stocks
article_text:
The approach was time-tested and hard to beat: Put your money in blue chips, decades-old companies that could be counted on to perform through thick and thin.

But now the market’s stalwarts are showing their age. Steady has become stagnant as companies once considered among the market’s most reliable post poor growth, quarter after woeful quarter.

The list of stumbling stars is remarkable: AT&T Inc., which on Wednesday...

twitter.description: Blue-chip companies are posting poor growth as their once-reliable formulas for success left them too big to switch tack quickly when market conditions changed.
twitter.creator: @theofrancis

article_summary:
The list of stumbling stars is remarkable: AT&T Inc., which on Wednesday...
But now the market’s stalwarts are showing their age.
Steady has become stagnant as companies once considered among the market’s most reliable post poor growth, quarter after woeful quarter.
The approach was time-tested and hard to beat: Put your money in blue chips, decades-old companies that could be counted on to perform through thick and thin.
